title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.130 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.130 - General

State Regulations

All sewage, including liquid waste, is to be disposed of in a public sewer or in a manner which protects the premises, personnel and contents within the establishment and does not create a nuisance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.130

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
